title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 509.1 - Responsibilities of official welfare agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 509.1 - Responsibilities of official welfare agencies

State Regulations
(a) Local welfare districts are responsible
for providing home medical care for tuberculosis patients who are eligible
recipients of medical assistance. (b) The local welfare district shall
ascertain that all recipients with tuberculosis are known to the local official
health agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
509.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
